projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
We would like to see a simple (classic app is enough) example on how to handle a today-extension in an own Titanium based app. It seems like it only requires some extension code and native handling, but an official example would be great to start with!

References:
- https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Conceptual/ExtensibilityPG/Today.html

Thank you!
fields.summary: iOS: Provide example on how to use today-extensions
